detaileddescription.para: (Insert text that categorizes a group of questions, if necessary, here. For example, "General".)

para.bold: (Q) What is the basic flow of the application?
para.emphasis: The MPU9250 application uses a common application format. When the app starts, initialization is performed, then the app enters an infinite loop waiting for commands from the software bus.
